desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.thai: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.ko: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會表明，自己的目的是來抓便利屋的問題學生。然而對策委員會學生卻反駁說，其他學園的風紀委員會在阿拜多斯高中自治區活動實屬越權，以此與格黑娜風紀委員會針鋒相對。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.thai: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.ko: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會雖然佔有數量上的優勢，結果還是不敵老師所指揮的對策委員會學生，最後以戰敗收場。戰鬥一結束，格黑娜風紀委員會的資深行政官亞子出面調解，而遙香則趁機開始策劃某種陰謀。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.thai: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 風紀委員會成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但卻引來了阿拜多斯一行人的不滿。由於對方未經授權在阿拜多斯境內活動，有無視許可權之疑，眾人決定迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.jp: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.thai: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.ko: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.zh_tw: 無意中犯下慘無人道的暴行的亞瑠。對策委員會的學生沒明白亞瑠的內心就指責她。結果亞瑠真的模仿壞蛋與對策委員會對立。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的阿露。对策委员会的学生没明白阿露的内心就指责她。结果阿露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.jp: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

desc.zh_tw: 就在便利屋和對策委員會的戰鬥達到最高潮時，砲擊突然從遠方襲來。綾音說發動砲擊的是格黑娜學園的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。

desc.en: Haruka blew up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even made Mutsuki started blaming her. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force was even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They started the battle immediately.
desc.jp: Haruka blew up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even made Mutsuki started blaming her. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force was even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They started the battle immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 因為亞瑠的失語使得遙香炸掉了拉麵店，就連無月也開始生氣了。對策委員會趕到後發現是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接開始了戰鬥。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为阿露的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。

desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.

desc.zh_tw: 凱薩理事對這意想不到的狀況非常氣憤。而老師則指揮對策委員會和便利屋學生對抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreat following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.

desc.en: The PMC director proposed to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognized him, and the latter said hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaked his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he said he wanted to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.

desc.zh_tw: PMC理事提出要將眾人造成的損失一併加入欠款金額中。星野認出了他，後者像星野問好，並“無意間”說出了自己僱傭便利屋和頭盔團的事情。之後，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好談論一下債務。
desc.zh_cn_jp: PMC理事提出要将众人造成的损失一并加入欠款金额中。星野认出了他，后者像星野问好，并“无意间”说出了自己雇佣便利屋和头盔团的事情。之后，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好谈论一下债务。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.thai: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.ko: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上寫說，為了免除阿拜多斯高中的債務，自己已經去當凱薩PMC的傭兵。在其餘對策委員會一行人深感混亂之際，PMC兵力為了佔領星野消失蹤影的阿拜多斯高中而來犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confessed the fact that she was going to be a mercenary at PMC, and said that "(the Black Suit) would take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confessed the fact that she was going to be a mercenary at PMC, and said that "(the Black Suit) would take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.thai: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confessed the fact that she was going to be a mercenary at PMC, and said that "(the Black Suit) would take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.ko: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confessed the fact that she was going to be a mercenary at PMC, and said that "(the Black Suit) would take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_tw: 星野留下了退社書和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做傭兵的事情，並說出了“（黑服）將會承擔一半阿拜多斯債務”的事情。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signed at PMC office. Black Suit said that in this way, Hoshino would be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino sold herself), and promised the debt would be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signed at PMC office. Black Suit said that in this way, Hoshino would be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino sold herself), and promised the debt would be taken care as promised.
desc.thai: Hoshino signed at PMC office. Black Suit said that in this way, Hoshino would be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino sold herself), and promised the debt would be taken care as promised.
desc.ko: Hoshino signed at PMC office. Black Suit said that in this way, Hoshino would be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino sold herself), and promised the debt would be taken care as promised.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在PMC辦公室簽了名。黑服表示，這樣的話，星野就將自己所有的權利轉移給了他（相當於賣了自己），並承諾債款將會如約承擔。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

desc.zh_tw: 星野表示這是自己應該揹負的責任，希望能夠減輕對策委員會的壓力。信在此終止。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻对策委员会的压力。信在此终止。

desc.en: In yet another letter, Hoshino confessed that she did, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.

desc.zh_tw: 因為耽誤到時間的關係，朱音和花凛也從封鎖中解放出來。就這樣，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危機。這時，愛麗絲及時現身解救遊戲開發部，讓一行人成功進入學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.

desc.zh_tw: 優香命令將收繳來的機器人加入戰場，明日奈的戰力也絕非等閒之輩，工程部無力壓制狙擊手花凜，朱音也正在趕來。在似乎無望之際，眾人想起了之前會議的內容。

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 優香等人終於到齊，宣佈了要把遊戲開發部關禁閉的處分。愛麗絲突然出現，以光之劍破除了障礙；花凜也被重新壓制。愛麗絲特別提到，在所有RPG遊戲中，勇者是從來不會放棄同伴的。受到鼓勵的眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人在詠葉部長的幫助下，成功甩開女僕部狙擊手花凛，但另一名女僕部成員明日奈卻出現在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.

desc.ko: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 就在桃井一行人以為已經逃離了威脅後，一發狙擊子彈向他們飛來，綠立刻意識到是狙擊手花凜所為。在樓頂上，就在花凜準備繼續下一發時，工程部及時阻止並擾亂了計劃。桃井等人立刻繼續前進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.thai: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的學生歡迎了開發部一行人。響主動提出要為愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一門軌道炮上。亞都梨主動為愛麗絲介紹了這門傑作，提到由於資金問題這門大砲的研發已經終止。工程師部眾人本以為愛麗絲無法舉起它，但後者不僅拿起了它，還不小心給房頂開了個洞；不得已，工程師部決定測試遊戲開發部眾人的能力，達標後才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.

desc.zh_tw: 兩小時前的作戰會議中，晴提到到達保管所的地方唯有通過電梯到達，然而電梯和頂樓各區域的門只能通過指紋驗證，且驗證失敗還會觸發多種機關。為了突破安全系統，響提出用EMP手雷癱瘓所有系統，到時貝里塔斯即可開始駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.zh_tw: 朱音以為碰見了桃井和綠，實際上卻是工程師部的真紀與亞都梨。朱音向優香請求確認監控狀態，這時大家才意識到監控已被駭入。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人勉強趕上截止期限，完成了<傳說年代記2>的開發。上傳遊戲後，遊戲開發部社團活動室遭到來歷不明的槍擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.thai: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.ko: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_tw: 對社團活動室發動槍擊的，是女僕部的部長寧瑠。寧瑠說對上次的戰鬥大感興趣，並對愛麗絲提出挑戰。經過好一陣混戰才滿足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.thai: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.ko: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人終於在最後一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要將demo上傳到網上供大家下載。評論開始湧來，下載量也在激增，而就在眾人緊張不安時，社團突然被幾發炮彈擊中。眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.

desc.zh_tw: 尼祿前來挑戰開發部眾人。尼祿先是稱讚了柚子的勇氣，然後向愛麗絲髮出挑戰，提出只要能打敗她，以前的事情就一筆勾銷。尼祿還沒反應過來，愛麗絲就搶先發射了光之劍。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠前来挑战开发部众人。宁瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。宁瑠还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠前来挑战开发部众人。宁瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。宁瑠还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.en: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru didn't pursue afterwards.

desc.zh_tw: 雖然尼祿在近戰方面優勢顯著，但愛麗絲透過將光之劍朝向地面開炮，在自傷48%的情況下先行撤離。尼祿最後決定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然尼禄在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。尼禄最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然宁瑠在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。宁瑠最后决定不再追究。

desc.en: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人順利取得<鏡子>之後，卻在扣押品保管所遭遇女僕部的部長寧瑠。多虧柚子急中生智成功騙過寧瑠，遊戲開發部才得以順利返回社團活動室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长尼禄。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过尼禄，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。

desc.en: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.jp: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.thai: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.ko: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.zh_tw: 三人成功到達了保管室，卻意外發現尼祿回來了。驚慌失措的眾人不小心發出了聲音引起注意，幸好柚子及時到來，騙過了尼祿使其離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现尼禄回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了尼禄使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现宁瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了宁瑠使其离开。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.

desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老師從貝里塔斯接獲發現可疑機器的訊息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老師和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起調查機器的來歷。但大家都無法對機器的來歷做出結論…突然間，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手觸碰機器，機器啟動的同時，愛麗絲也發生了異變。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在千年廣場遇到了其他千年的學生，大家都很高興見到她。中途愛麗絲還收到了幾個支線任務，被以報酬的名義贈送了點心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.jp: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園裡見到了工程部三人，後者表示是出來蒐羅新裝備的。詠葉問愛麗絲光之劍近況如何，愛麗絲則表示在很愛護地使用著。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不點”讓後者頗為不滿，但還是拽著老師和愛麗絲到了遊戲廳。不出所料，寧瑠不斷輸給了愛麗絲，儘管愛麗絲已經教了她相當一段時間。寧瑠雖然非常惱火愛麗絲評價她的水平不好，但還是請教愛麗絲連招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
